title: Cooperage
creator_credit: Rocky Mountain Films, ONF | NFB and Phillip Borsos
brief_description: Features the Sweeney Cooperage, manufacturing wooden barrels in an assembly plant on False Creek in Vancouver, as it has done since it was founded in 1895 by Leo Sweeney. Points out that the cooperage is completely a family operation, and at one time it was the largest
